synthesis_conditions.comments: Gel formation observed at different wt % of gelator in various solvents. Precipitate (ppt) or solution formation noted in some conditions.

solvents: Anhydrous Acetonitrile (< 0.150 mL) and doubly-deionized water
synthesis_conditions.comments: Gel formation observed at wt % gelator values of 2.0, 1.8, 1.6, and 1.4.

x-ray_analysis.equipment: Nonius Kappa CCD single-crystal X-ray diffractometer
x-ray_analysis.comments: Structure contains highly disordered solvent molecules. Solvent model treated with SQUEEZE routine of PLATON.

rheology.comments: Thixotropic behavior observed with yield values ranging from 8 to 12 Pa for the gels.

tem_studies.comments: SAED diffraction performed using JEOL 2100F TEM at 200 kV to show amorphous nature of NMOP.

afm_studies.comments: 40 individual spherically-shaped nanoparticles studied. Height-to-diameter ratio of 0.36 ± 0.01 determined.

stxm_studies.equipment: STXM instrument on beamline 5.3.2 of the Advanced Light Source (Berkeley, CA)
stxm_studies.comments: C and N K-edge NEXAFS spectra collected for approximately 15 individual nanoparticles. Spectra similar to pyridine, indicating coordination of pyridyl groups to Cu(II) ions.
